titulo: Spanish Short Stories for Beginners: 10 Easy to Read Short Stories to Help You Learn New Words in Spanish
descripcion:
This audiobook contains 10 enjoyable short stories of about 1,000 words each along with their respective vocabulary of relevant words translated into English. Each story also includes instructions on how to start improving your comprehension skills and figure out the vocabulary before consulting the glossaries.
